alert.note: Alert for Motherlode; Northeast Foothills, Sacramento Valley; West Slope Northern Sierra Nevada; Western Plumas County, Lassen Park (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued December 26 at 12:02PM PST until December 28 at 4:00AM PST by NWS Sacramento
info.description: ...Winter Storm to Impact Mountain and Foothill Travel into Tuesday... .Unsettled weather will continue early this week with additional mountain snow and gusty winds. We will see another round of heavy snow later this afternoon into Monday with snow showers lingering into Monday night. Snow levels will generally be between 1500 and 2500 feet lowering Monday morning down to 1000 feet, locally lower over Shasta County. Major travel delays and difficult to impossible travel conditions are anticipated through early this week. Gusty winds will further reduce visibilities during this event with local whiteout conditions possible. Holiday travelers should prepare for winter driving conditions by packing chains, warm winter clothes, and extra food and water. Foothill locations that do not normally receive snow should prepare for wintry conditions. ...WINTER STORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 4 AM PST TUESDAY ABOVE 1500 FEET... * WHAT...Heavy snow. Travel will be very difficult to impossible. Additional snow accumulations of 1 to 3 feet, with localized amounts up to 5 feet, are expected. Lessor amounts down to 1500 feet, locally lower. * WHERE...Northeast Foothills/Sacramento Valley, Motherlode, Western Plumas County/Lassen Park and West Slope Northern Sierra Nevada. * WHEN...Until 4 AM Tuesday. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Be prepared for significant reductions in visibility at times. Snow levels will mainly be above 2000 feet tonight but lower to around 1000 feet on Monday where minor accumulations may occur. PRECAUTIONARY/PREPAREDNESS ACTIONS... A Winter Storm Warning for snow means there will be snow covered roads and limited visibilities. Travel is not recommended while the warning is in effect. If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency.The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.

area.areaDesc: Motherlode; Northeast Foothills, Sacramento Valley; West Slope Northern Sierra Nevada; Western Plumas County, Lassen Park
